meta.article_title: February 27, 2023 - Start with Your Trickiest Serve

start_with_your_trickiest_serve.probleme: Holding back on trickiest serve until close

debutant: Use tricky serve the first point of the match

exercices_complementaires.description: Regularly use tricky serves to gain experience in judging when to use them

metriques_progression: More experienced at judging when to use tricky serves
erreurs_a_eviter: Over-relying on tricky serves, especially long ones
